groups.name: AgTech Innovators
groups.description: A community of tech professionals exploring and developing innovative solutions for agriculture. We discuss IoT, AI, robotics, and other technologies that can revolutionize farming.

groups.name: Urban Farming Enthusiasts
groups.description: For those interested in applying technology to urban farming solutions. We focus on vertical farming, hydroponics, aquaponics, and small-scale agriculture in urban environments.

groups.name: Sustainable Food Systems
groups.description: Discussing the intersection of technology and sustainable food production. Topics include supply chain optimization, food waste reduction, and sustainable farming practices.

groups.name: From Code to Crops
groups.description: A support group for software developers and IT professionals who are transitioning to careers in agriculture. Share experiences, advice, and opportunities.

groups.name: Agricultural Data Science
groups.description: Focused on applying data science, machine learning, and analytics to agricultural challenges. We work on projects related to crop prediction, resource optimization, and more.

groups.name: Farm-to-Table Tech
groups.description: Exploring technologies that connect farmers directly with consumers. We discuss e-commerce platforms, logistics optimization, and direct marketing strategies for small farms.
